data.text: @AdversusN Idk man, might be time to invest in a tranq dart gun

@AdversusN @karmacondon tipped me to the All Things Considered episode with Frank Luntz’s focus group that tried to crack this nut. Even that same excuse. That lab coat thing really was one of the things that worked. (Chris Christie was the other thing that worked.)

https://t.co/YbpOAVQ31H

@rohit_ajitkumar I guess it depends on how many it is. 50 million at that price is $7.5 billion. I guess that's not insane. But it depends if enough will take it at that price. If it goes up to $1000 it'll be difficult to justify
@rohit_ajitkumar Yeah lol. You think they'll bid us up to $150 per? They'll have to do something to convince the last few million.
@razingarizona They're all like "I'm skeptical because it came out too quickly. It's supposed to take years."
@AdversusN Have a doctor explain it to them, preferably while wearing a white lab coat.
